org.modelio.api.module.report

Class Report

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modelio.api.module.report.Report

  • public class Report
extends java.lang.Object
    A Report is a sequence of ReportEntry records. Beside storing the recorded ReportEntry instances, this class mainly provides several convenience methods to add errors, warnings tips and infos to the report. See @link addError(int, String, MObject...) and similar methods.

    Note about the use of varargs for the related MObject objects: 

     // To add objects obj1, obj2 and obj3, simply pass the objects to the addXXX() call
 addError(1001, "My formatted message with three related objects", obj1, obj2 obj3);
 
 // For 'no objects' , do not pass 'null' but rather pass nothing
 addError(1001, "My formatted message with no related objects");

    Since:
    4.1

    • Method Detail

      • addError

        public void addError(int code,
                     java.lang.String message,
                     MObject... mObjects)
        Adds an ERROR message to the Report. The added error message has no category and no help topic.
        Parameters:
        code - - the message code (mandatory)
        message - - the formatted message, with I18n and parameter substitution already done.
        mObjects - - the model elements related to this entry. By convention the first one is the 'main' element where the error occured or was detected.

      • addWarning

                       MObject... mObjects)

        message - - the formatted message, with I18n and parameter substitution already done.
        mObjects - - the model elements related to this entry. By convention the first one is the 'main' element where the warning occured or was detected.

        Parameters:

        message - - the formatted message, with I18n and parameter substitution already done.
        mObjects - - the model elements related to this entry. By convention the first one is the 'main' element where the tip was identified.

      • addError

        public void addError(int code,
                     java.lang.String category,
                     java.lang.String message,
                     MObject... mObjects)
        Adds an ERROR message to the Report. The added error message has no help topic.
        Parameters:
        code - - the message code (mandatory)
        category - - the message category (may be null)
        message - - the formatted message, with I18n and parameter substitution already done.
        mObjects - - the model elements related to this entry. By convention the first one is the 'main' element where the error occured or was detected.

      • addError

        public void addError(int code,
                     java.lang.String category,
                     java.lang.String helpUrl,
                     java.lang.String message,
                     MObject... mObjects)
        Adds an ERROR message to the Report.
        Parameters:
        code - - the message code (mandatory)
        category - - the message category (may be null)
        helpUrl - - the message help topic in the Modelio Help (may be null)
        message - - the formatted message, with I18n and parameter substitution already done.
        mObjects - - the model elements related to this entry. By convention the first one is the 'main' element where the error occured or was detected.
